name: PDFCover
description: Generates cover images for your PDF files.

versions.changelog:
- Prepare for release v2 (#20) @[github-actions[bot]](https://github.com/apps/github-actions)
- added comment to explain dll.win (#19) @unfedorg
- Added some unit tests (#17) @unfedorg
- Follow single major version management just like jellyfin does (#15) @unfedorg
- Removed MinVer and fixed few version text (#13) @unfedorg
- Prepare plugin manifest for release v1.0.19 (#11) @[github-actions[bot]](https://github.com/apps/github-actions)
- Potential fix for code scanning alert no. 2: Call to System.IO.Path.Combine (#7) @unfedorg
Initial release of PDF Cover plugin.
